main.name: Mohammad Tahsin
main.description: A passionate and pragmatic programmer with 2 years of professional experience, specializing in full-stack development using modern & robust technologies.
main.bio: I profetionally work with server technologies mostly. Front end development is sort of hobby. But I don't prefer to work profetionally on front end. Clean Coding, Good Practices, Following Conventions are my passion. I enjoy turning concepts into reality.

work.title: Backend Engineer
work.description: Mostly working with backend development. Working both with API driven technologies like gRPC, Rest & Event driven technologies like Google Pub/Sub, WebSockets & So on... Also having good time with software testing.

work.title: Junior Frontend Developer
work.description: Was working with Vue.js.It was exciting for me as I could finally apply the knowledge I've gained, in the real world application.

work.title: IT Officer
work.description: Mostly I was working with networking, email server, HR & Store management software & so on...

work.title: Caller Agent (International)
work.description: The Customer Service Representative I answers inbound calls and makes outbound calls to support Customer Service Department operations in a manner that maintains compliance with Medicare and Medi-Cal regulatory requirements and achieves Call Center service-level objectives.

work.description: I was responsible for taking both inbound and outbound calls & providing excellent, relaiable marketing information & migrate customers.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
